lever.additional:
Are you interested in building products which build on top of a massive user base and still shoot for the stars? Do you enjoy iterative software development and quickly building products with the ability to see the real time impact of your contribution? Here is an opportunity to work with the Customer Platforms team of the fastest growing startup in the sub-continent. Our team is responsible for everything related to GoJek’s customer app covering Customer Experience, Growth, and Incentives at scale across 20+ products.

You get to work with an insanely driven and proud team of engineers who work across Transport, Food Delivery, C2C logistics and Mobile Payments space at a really interesting combination of scale and complexity. Oh yes and did we mention that you get to know about and travel to countries across South East Asia as well!

Gojek is an equal opportunity workplace that is committed to diversity and inclusion. At Gojek we celebrate our differences, because we believe that diversity not only creates a healthier work environment for our employees, but also helps our business thrive. 



About us

Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
lever.description:
Senior engineering manager is a leadership role, which direct reports are engineering managers and senior engineers of the team. As a senior engineering manager, you will be accountable to lead a team of 10 - 30 engineers.

To excel in this role we believe you need the ability to drive strategic technical, delivery and people decisions for the team by collaborating with cross-functional counterparts and stakeholders and also considering inputs from various parties, most importantly from the customers. You are also expected to coach and nurture your team, including but not limited to managers in the team who report to you.

Senior engineering manager is a leadership role, which direct reports are engineering managers and senior engineers of the team. As a senior engineering manager, you will be accountable to lead a team of 10 - 30 engineers.

To excel in this role we believe you need the ability to drive strategic technical, delivery and people decisions for the team by collaborating with cross-functional counterparts and stakeholders and also considering inputs from various parties, most importantly from the customers. You are also expected to coach and nurture your team, including but not limited to managers in the team who report to you.

lists.content:
• Drives business strategy along with cross-functional counterparts & works with team members to convert that into OKRs.
  • Work closely with your counterparts to ensure that the team’s deliverables fit well into broader organization objectives.
  • Able to represent and be accountable for the technical output of the team.
  • Ensures that knowledge is shared amongst the team and does not position themselves or others as a single point of failure.
  • Crosses team and service boundaries to work across budgeting, legal, compliance, and security aspects of the team’s delivery.
  • Monitors and adjusts team pace to instill urgency for success but protect from burnout.
  • Independently responsible for coaching, development, and career management for the team.
  • Independently plans and executes changes to team staffing in service of company goals: identifying gaps, defining roles, and creating people-planning for the team.

• Engineers typically acquire the skills, knowledge, and experience necessary to meet the expectations of this role with at least 8 years of relevant industry experience.
  • Has demonstrated ability to successfully lead people, teams or projects multiple times in different contexts.
  • Well-versed with Agile methodologies, best practices of writing tests and Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery.
  • Has strong expertise and hands-on experience in at least one engineering focus (front-end, back-end, mobile, data or systems).
  • Experience developing end-to-end products across mobile and backend at scale.
  • Excellent written & verbal communication skills focused on improving collaboration, understanding & information exchange across all stakeholders.
  • Willingness to relocate to Jakarta - relocation support will be provided.
• Experience in a similar role with a high-growth company.
